WRITING.TITLE: Safe to ride with broken nipple?
WRITING.TEXT: Had a couple bails in the last month, went to ride today and when I got to the park I realized one the nipples on my back tire had snapped in half. Has anyone had this problem? Will it hurt my rim if I ride with it for a few days till I can fix it?

BC, Canada Under $10k Car Daily driver No need for warranty, though decent reliability is needed.... Can do normal maintenance but nothing crazy. Ideally something good on gas but still #8220;zippy #8221; for lack of a better term. Been looking at some mk4-6 golf gti #8217;s but curious what other options there were. Awd is great for where I live but not necessary, understandably at this price point it #8217;s harder to get too.

WRITING.TITLE: Idk at this point, not important.
WRITING.TEXT: I have no fucking clue what #8217;s wrong with me at this point, whether it #8217;s a good idea or bad I just wanted to put this in writing. I constantly think about dying, and over the past months I #8217;ve started to just embrace it when I think about it instead of pushing it off to the side. I #8217;m constantly stressed out to the point where I #8217;ll punch my self in my head over and over so I stop thinking about the stress and start thinking about real pain for a few seconds. I don #8217;t enjoy pain per say, I just enjoy how it has the ability to temporarily steal my attention. I #8217;m not gonna commit suicide, I know this. If there was a way that made sense I would, but I have sisters and a mom that I #8217;m not willing to put in that position. Sometimes though, I #8217;ll hop on my bike (I ride bmx, happens to be the only other time I #8217;m not stressed) and ride through the city as fast as I can going through red light after red light wondering if and when I #8217;ll get hit. I #8217;ve lost all motivation to date or talk to anyone, if it was up to me I wouldn #8217;t talk to anyone but the way my life is set up it doesn #8217;t work that way. There #8217;s a girl I #8217;ve been talking to, I say things as though I like her. Originally I thought i did. But now every time I open her text it just drains me. I #8217;ll hit my head a couple times and take a breath, then I #8217;ll respond with something perfect. I #8217;m good at responding to people with exactly what I should say. Exactly what they want to hear, and when they want to hear it. But everytime I do, I feel emptier and more stressed. This all sounds incredibly pathetic and manufactured I #8217;m aware. And I #8217;m not sure what the point of this post is.

That #8217;s shitty, but your friends suck. Whether or not I can stop you is up to you. But do everyone a favour and just make one call and tell someone. Whether it #8217;s suicide hotline, or the last person you can think of that might be of help. Even going outside and being in public. I have nothing good to say, and anything I do say is rather hypocritical, but the second you start, your gonna feel worse.

WRITING.TITLE: Anyone else feel the need to end things but can #8217;t because it #8217;ll cause to much of an effect on family, friends, etc...?

WRITING.TEXT: Got an mri coming up soon now that I think of it, see how it goes

WRITING.TITLE: No longer caring if I live or die, but not actively suicidal.
WRITING.TEXT: Everything in my life is causing me stress at this point, whether it #8217;s something/someone good or not it doesn #8217;t matter. I #8217;ve come to realize how peaceful death actually would be (not to sound emo) but I know when I die it #8217;s gonna leave my family and friends in a bad place. Idk what to do at this point.
Yea I know what your talking. I mtb and snowboard, but the second I #8217;m back off the bike/board I fall right back to where I started.
Yeah I #8217;ve had days like that

WRITING.TITLE: Tell me what to do. I don #8217;t fucking know at this point.
WRITING.TEXT: I never understand my emotions. Most of the day I day dream about dying, different ways to do it, what it would feel like, how people would be affected, etc... earlier I was with a girl. Every time she texts I feel like shit, the text is never negative, but just seeing the notification come up makes me feel like garbage. I think I like her, tho I #8217;ve been dodging her since I got home because I don #8217;t know how to keep her away. I don #8217;t want to keep living, but I don #8217;t want to go out by choice. I want to blast through intersections on my bike till I get hit by a car. But even that concerns me because if i don #8217;t die, I #8217;ll have more problems to deal with and possibly a harder time dying next time. My family (mom and sisters) care about me, even a couple friends and the girl. But I never have and never will tell any of them how I feel. This sub has been the first and only time I ever talk about how I feel. I don #8217;t know what to do, right now I don #8217;t feel any emotion, I don #8217;t want to die, I don #8217;t want to live, I don #8217;t want to talk to anyone, and I don #8217;t wanna push people away, I just feel nothing. Earlier when I was with the girl, I was at a creek and kept looking at the water longingly thinking about just falling in and never coming up for air. About a month ago I started turning my shower hotter than I could take it to enjoy the pain, every time getting hotter and hotter till it gets numb, and I step out of the shower with my back red. But I can #8217;t shower all the time, or everytime I feel like dying, so I #8217;ve started punching myself in the head, and today I got a harsh headache. I snowboard and dirtjump (basically bmx) and am good at mathematics and have thought about becoming an engineer in the future, but I do #8217;t think I want a future, I don #8217;t want to mess my head up more because I already have four concussions, but I just wanna die in a way the least affects other people. I don #8217;t know what the fuck is wrong with me, I know that no one has made it this far, but here it is. I #8217;ve also found that there #8217;s ways to starve your brain of oxygen to make yourself pass out and holy fuck do I love that. It feels like a drug and temporarily I feel happy. I just don #8217;t know what to fucking do anymore.

WRITING.TITLE: Anybody know what the cold running feeling is when you hit your head?
WRITING.TEXT: Not too sure how else to explain it, kinda feels like bliss running down where it was hit, but when you feel it, it #8217;s dry.
17m can #8217;t exactly do that. The ideas good, though ik even if I could I #8217;d never come back....
Alright that #8217;s clean asf. Not too low, still meat on the tires. No stretch. No crazy wing. No weird aero. Just a fucking nice looking build man keep it up!

For bunny hops, try lifting the front first, this will dictate your height so as high as you feel comfortable with, then bring your back wheel up when your front wheels at the height you want. Should look like, front up, back up, both down. Looking good tho man.

WRITING.TITLE: Anybody have good sayings?
WRITING.TEXT: Looking for some sayings to put on shirts and am curious what you guys got.
